class.name: BlobFocus
class.brief_description: Prioritizes a region in which to show blob shadows.
class.description: The number of blob shadows that can be shown at one time is limited (for performance reasons). The [BlobFocus] node enables the user to set specific areas where the limited number of shadow casters should be prioritized. [BlobFocus] might typically be set relative to a [Camera], or attached to a player. Where multiple cameras are used, each [Camera] can have its own [BlobFocus].
